info.name: Address Validate API REST
info.description: Address Validate API provides a REST interface for accessing address searching and verification functionality.

request.url: https://api.experianmarketingservices.com/capture/v1/search-address/text?query=<Address to search for>&country=<three digit country ISO code>
request.description: Searches for addresses based on an unstructured text query.

request.url: https://api.experianmarketingservices.com/capture/v1/verify-address/text/?query=<Address to be verified>&country=<three digit country ISO code>
request.description: Verifies the address based on an unstructured text query.

request.url: https://api.experianmarketingservices.com/capture/v1/address-layout/<ID of address to be returned as detailed address layout record>
request.description: Returns a single, detailed address layout record for a supplied identifier.
